channel.title: Money?
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to add money onto my character?
I couldn't find anything when I searched... :(

item.title: Money?
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

matthewj234:

Type ::pickup 999999999 and ur charecter gets 999M, or wen u get like 1 gp put it in your first inventory slot close ur run server go to the charecters file and scroll down to Charecter items. Then on the first one in stead of the second number being 1 change in to 214710000. Then u have 2Billion in ur inent.

you will probably beed an admin account for that aswell

Read full topic
